item.title: My first scrollytelling project
item.description: Context Scrollytelling had been on my wishlist for some time. I love this method as it allows guiding the reader step by step through the narrative, using annotations and animations. I’ve also submitted it to this month’s Storytelling with Data Challenge “annotate it!” . To test out the technique, I chose to reimagine a data visualization that was mostly static. Here is its summary: The result See the complete scrollytelling version here.
